meanings.definition: A person who frivolously wastes time or money.
meanings.sent1: The fribbler spent hours browsing online without any purpose.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the office fribbler for always buying unnecessary items.
meanings.sent3: The fribbler thought it was a good idea to buy a gold-plated stapler.
meanings.sent4: His reputation as a fribbler followed him wherever he went.
meanings.sent5: The fribbler's wallet was always empty from impulsive purchases.

meanings.definition: To waste time or money in a frivolous manner.
meanings.sent1: Don't fribbler away your savings on things you don't need.
meanings.sent2: She tends to fribbler on social media instead of doing her work.
meanings.sent3: He decided to fribbler his afternoon by watching cat videos.
meanings.sent4: The company cannot afford to fribbler resources on unimportant projects.
meanings.sent5: Time is too precious to fribbler on meaningless tasks.
